author.persName: Samsam al-Daulah Shahnawaz Khan Khwafi Aurangabadi.

msItem.title: Ma'athir al-Umara.
msItem.note: The first part of a manuscript of the whole work, the rest of which is contained in Codrington/Reade No 105 Folio one, recto; Presented to the Oriental Translation Comt bu Sir A Malet Bart Biographies of the most celebrated Amirs and others who lived Under the Mughals. The first portion to the middle of the entry on Danishmand Khan. In the revised edition of Ghulam 'Ali 'Azad' Bilgrami. Headings and punctuation in red. Headings and punctuation in red.

bindingDesc.p: Red leather Oriental binding, with stamped, tooled and painted decoration. Doublures of dark-blue paper with design printed in silver.

origin.p: 1204 (At end of the MS, now Codrington/Reade No 105)

availability.p: Visitors are welcome to consult manuscripts in the library by prior appointment. Information on access is available on the library page of the Society's web site at www.royalasiaticsociety.org and appointments can be arranged by e-mailing library@royalasiaticsociety.org

list.item: History of India, biographies, Mughal period.
